titles.title: Private Enterprise Protection Act
To prevent governmental entities from using tax-exempt financing to engage in unfair competition against private enterprise.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/18/1999--Introduced. Private Enterprise Protection Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit the classification as a "private activity bond" of any bond from which more than the lesser of five percent of the proceeds or $1 million will be used to finance the construction, rehabilitation, or expansion of a "disqualified facility." Defines such facility.
